channel.title: Omakase on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Omakase on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Sushi on Jones
item.description: Another omakase. Decent sushi place. Fast in/out in 20 minutes. $58 total. Got an extra toro/uni hand roll which added another $20ish.

item.title: Nakazawa
item.description: It’s an Omakase. Michelin 1 star. Very good for the price. Got sake pairing + sushi + EXTRAS… only $220 per person. The lychee sorbet was awesome.
